======
Export
======

Press this button to export project metadata to zip file. This zip file will
contain:

* Information about project data structure, code and interface settings that 
  is strored in the *admin.sqlite* database.
  
* Files from the following folders:

  * css
  * js
  * static/css
  * static/js
  * static/img
  * reports (*ods* files of project report templates)
  * utils (this folder may contain some python libraries used in the project)
